sentences.sContent: Dedally didst thou perform the tragic pasquinade.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dedally didst thou perform the tragic pasquinade.
sentences.sCn: 你表演着悲情的讽刺文。

sentences.sContent: To ridicule with a pasquinade; satirize or lampoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: To ridicule with a pasquinade; satirize or lampoon.

trans.tranOther: an abusive lampoon or satire, esp one posted in a public place
